mapper.select: select b.id, user_id, title, create_time, u.username from bs_bbs.tb_blog b join bs_bbs.tb_user u on b.user_id=u.id order by create_time desc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize};
select count(*) from bs_bbs.tb_plate_blog where plate_id=#{id};
select count(*) from bs_bbs.tb_blog where user_id=#{id};
select top, tb.id, title, username, create_time, head_portrait from tb_home_blog thb inner join bs_bbs.tb_blog tb on thb.blog_id=tb.id join tb_user tu on tu.id = tb.user_id order by top;
mapper.update: update bs_bbs.tb_home_blog set top=#{top} where blog_id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into bs_bbs.tb_plate_home_blog(plate_id, blog_id, top) VALUES (#{plateId},#{blogId},#{top});
mapper.update: update bs_bbs.tb_plate_home_blog set top=#{top} where plate_id=#{plateId} and blog_id=#{blogId};
mapper.delete: delete from bs_bbs.tb_plate_home_blog where plate_id=#{plateId} and blog_id=#{blogId};
mapper.insert: insert into bs_bbs.tb_blog (user_id, title, create_time, content) values (#{userId},#{title},#{createTime},#{content});
mapper.select: select id from bs_bbs.tb_blog where user_id=#{userId} order by create_time desc limit 0,1;
mapper.update: update bs_bbs.tb_blog set content=#{content},title=#{title} where id=#{id};
